title: Morning Beverage Preference: Stacked Bar Graph
question_text:
Patty is the manager of a marketing company and is planning a big breakfast to celebrate her company's success in landing a major new client. She wondered about what drinks to serve with breakfast and decided to survey each employee in her office regarding their morning beverage preference. The results are displayed below in a stacked bar graph.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.

Which of the following is closest to the percent of those surveyed who said they prefer coffee?
